mainHero.title: Welcome to
mainHero.subtitle: UW Strength Club
mainHero.description: The UWSC facilitates a supportive gym environment for UW gym-goers. We aim to break down barriers for beginners, by teaching members how to lift weights in a safe and healthy manner. We especially make efforts to encourage more women to join the gym space and kickstart their gym journey. Our club encompasses different fitness disciplines including powerlifting, olympic lifting, bodybuilding, calisthenics, and general strength.

membInfo.title: Membership Information
perks: Access to ALL UWSC workshops, seminars, lift-togethers and competitions
Access to specialty UWSC equipment at PAC
Discounts through our partners (Biosteel, Domino's etc.)
Opportunity to be featured on Member Mondays
membInfo.disclaimer: *Memberships are active for only the term they are purchased.
membInfo.disclaimer2: *Membership may be revoked if member breaks WlooRec or our guidelines.
membInfo.disclaimer3: *All members may join the discord community for free

items.title: Battle of the Barbells Mock Meet
items.description: Come out to our end of term mock meet and test your max SBD or max Oly lifts. This event is designed for all to come show off their hard work and progress from over the term.
